title: Son.Of.Batman.2014.BDRip.XviD.Dublado-ANGELiCA
description:
The newest animated DC Comics, Batman Son, introduces Damian, the child who has never met Bruce Wayne. The story is based on the 2006 story arc written by Grant Morrison, where Batman discovers he has a violent, arrogant and highly trained son still only ten years old, secretly created by the League of Assassins.
